list-item.p: ILI incidence data (CDCâ€™s unweighted weekly ILI activity level), athenahealth data (weekly proportion of flu visit, ILI visit, and unspecified viral or ILI visit 327 that are aggregated from 78,000 healthcare providers nationwide), and Google search frequency data (of 129 Google search queries most highly correlated with ILI).
Error Metrics: RMS Error, Mean Absolute Error, Mean Absolute Percentage Error
Forecasting Targets: real-time ILI incidence, peak value and peak time of ILI incidence for each season
